modName: Axes and hammers well positioned on back
summary: This mod replace the 2 handed weapons on back .
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][img]http://www.marvelscustoms.com/gardien/igalerie/albums/LOTR/LEGOLAS_AND_GIMLI_ON_AROD_WETA_STATUE_07__Copier_.jpg[/img]   

         [color=#dbb0a7]TWO[/color] [color=#fff2cc]HANDED[/color] [color=#c9daf8]WEAPONS[/color] [color=#d9ead3]ON[/color] [color=#a4c2f4]BACK[/color] [color=#ea9999]REPLACER
 [/color]
[/size][size=5]REMEMBER THIS ISN'T COMPATIBLE WITH OTHER MODIFICATION OF SKELETON ,
USE ONLY ONE OR YOU WILL DONT SEE ANY CHANGE   !
[/size][size=4]

[b]NEW VERSION 1.1[/b]

[color=#efefef]-Replaced the old skeleton for a fixed one .[/color]

[b]What do this mod[/b][/size] [color=#ff0000]: [/color]

this mod replace the two handed weapons on back .


[b][i][color=#ffff00]INSTALATION : [/color][u]to install this mod , extract the file into your :[/u]
[size=4]            [/size][color=#0b5394] [/color]

[size=6][color=#f1c232] Skyrim /Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/Character assets[/color][color=#ffff00] [/color]
[/size]

[color=#00ffff]REQUERIMENTS:[/color]

[/i][/b]-Skyrim
-Dawnguard
-Dragonborn

[b][i][u][color=#980000][size=4]COMPATIBILITY:[/size][/color]

[/u][/i][/b] -This mod is fully compatible with all mods . EXCEPT OTHER SKELETON.[b][i][u][size=3]
[/size][size=4][color=#00ff00]
THANKS TO:[/color]
[/size][/u][/i][/b]
Me , to create the new skeletons

Nif Skope 

Bethesda , to create Skyrim and CK

[size=4][b][i][u][color=#e69138]PERMISIONS:[/color]

[/u][/i][/b][/size]If you want to continue / do a remake of this mod , you must ask me first.
author: Evildark
